name: CTPulmonaryAngiogramCTPA
title: CT Pulmonary Angiogram CTPA
description: CT pulmonary angiography (CTPA) will show filling defects within the pulmonary vasculature with acute pulmonary emboli. When the artery is viewed in its axial plane the central filling defect from the thrombus is surrounded by a thin rim of contrast, which has been called the Polo Mint sign.
